feature_model.name: acarlos_trab2_mobile
feature_model.feature_tree: :r acarlos_trab2_mobile (f_acarlos_trab2_mobile) :m display (f_display) :m calls (f_calls) :o media (f_media) :g [1, *] : camera (f_camera) : mp3 (f_mp3) :o gps (f_gps) :g [1, 1] : colour (f_colour) : basic (f_basic) : high resolution (f_high_resolution)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_camera or f_acarlos_trab2_mobile constraint_2:~f_camera or f_high_resolution constraint_3:~f_basic or ~f_gps
